com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.checking.inline.markings.offset

Class OffsetMarkingsImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.checking.inline.markings.offset.OffsetMarkingsImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Markings

    public class OffsetMarkingsImpl
extends Object
implements Markings
    The OffsetMarkingsImpl provides the Markings-functionality for offset based integrations. It splits the needed implementations into useful chunks.

    To create a new instance of this class use GuiFactory.markings().
    See: OffsetCalculator, OffsetMarkingList, OffsetEditorView
